  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Confederate Currency: An Inflation Simulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbündete Währung: Eine 
Inflation-Simulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Devise Confédérée : Une Simulation 
d'Inflation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moeda corrente Confederate: Uma Simulação 
Da Inflação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Valuta Confederata: Una Simulazione Di 
Inflazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομόσπονδο νόμισμα: Μια προσομοίωση πληθωρισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modernidad Confederada: Una Simulación De 
la Inflación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using primary sources from the Documenting the American South collection, this lesson provides a brief simulation of inflation during the Civil War while introducing students to issues faced on the home front.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Primärquellen vom Dokumentieren der 
amerikanischen Südansammlung, stellt diese Lektion eine kurze 
Simulation der Inflation während des Bürgerkrieges beim Vorstellen 
der Kursteilnehmer zu den Ausgaben zur Verfügung, die auf der 
Hauptfrontseite gegenübergestellt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant des sources primaires de documenter 
la collection du sud américaine, cette leçon fournit une 
brève simulation de l'inflation pendant la guerre civile tout en 
présentant des étudiants aux issues faites face sur l'avant à la 
maison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando fontes preliminares de documentar a 
coleção sul americana, esta lição fornece uma simulação breve da
inflação durante a guerra civil ao introduzir estudantes às 
edições enfrentadas na parte dianteira home.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le sorgenti primarie dalla documentazione 
dell'accumulazione del sud americana, questa lezione fornisce una 
breve simulazione di inflazione durante la guerra civile mentre 
introduce gli allievi alle edizioni affrontate con parte anteriore 
domestica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τις αρχικές πηγές από την τεκμηρίωση 
η αμερικανική νότια συλλογή, αυτό το μάθημα παρέχει μια 
συνοπτική προσομοίωση του πληθωρισμού κατά τη διάρκεια του 
εμφύλιου πολέμου εισάγοντας τους σπουδαστές στα ζητήματα που 
αντιμετωπίζονται στο βασικό μέτωπο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando fuentes primarias de documentar la 
colección del sur americana, esta lección proporciona a una 
simulación abreviada de la inflación durante la guerra civil 
mientras que introduce a estudiantes a las ediciones hechas frente en 
el frente casero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
